mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id, t1.sea_id, t2.`name` as seaName, t1.import_source_file_name, t1.success_num as num, t1.create_time as importTime FROM we_leads_import_record t1 LEFT JOIN we_leads_sea t2 on t1.sea_id = t2.id
AND t1.import_source_file_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
